name: The Apprentice (TriJam#181)
description:
Storage Management in your Spellbook! (TriJam#181)

Your Spellbook does not have enough room to cast all you want...
Remember: Storage management!

Place the spells in your book as good as you can. No more info - it's part of the challenge to find out!

Think before you click!
This is a magical book, so spells inscribe instantly and they can't be taken back.
Once in the book, it will happen as it's written.

No worries! You are at most a hundred deaths away from beating the dark witch! :-)

---

Personal note

This game is a larger one, we did it in a team with one designer and 3 developers, we just wanted to find out, what we can achieve, if multiple people need to watch the time and coordinate at the same time.

This jam was an amazing experience! We learned so much!

We hope, you like the game, we really put massive energy into it and hope, it can stand out in terms of quality for such an early prototype of a casting game!

Have fun!

Gris & Team
